queries.compiledQueryString:
select stop_id as id, stop_lat as lat, stop_lon as lon, 1 as color from GTFS.stops
union
select shape_id as id, shape_pt_lat as lat, shape_pt_lon as lon, 2 as color from GTFS.shapes where shape_id in ('shp-10-54')
queries.inputQueryString:
select stop_id as id, stop_lat as lat, stop_lon as lon, 1 as color from GTFS.stops
union
select shape_id as id, shape_pt_lat as lat, shape_pt_lon as lon, 2 as color from GTFS.shapes where shape_id in ('shp-10-54')
